title: Painting the Void
description:
Making your passion your full-time job is not easy. Artist Matley Hurd knows this all too well. But when the coronavirus pandemic hit, things changed for him — he found himself with more time, and an unexpected new canvas to showcase his work. 

Follow Mat on Instagram and Twitter

Learn more about Paint the Void

Follow Paint the Void on Instagram and Twitter

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
